articles.title: Solar storm travelling at 1.8million km per hour to hit Earth - Daily Express
articles.description: A SOLAR STORM travelling at more than 500 kilometres per second is due to collide with Earth on Sunday, and it could have enough of an impact to affect Earth's satellite technology.
